item.title: Blogdown - An R Package For Blogging [How-To]
item.description: Why blogdown? Do you use R? Or are interested in learning about using R for your academic or business analyses? Do you want to create professional-looking reports showcasing your analyses? Want to put up your work on the web? Look no further! The RStudio team just dropped blogdown, an R package that makes it easy to create a professional looking websites. Here are a couple of things which make blogdown awesome:
